00015          * up to a maximum of ``max_usecs``

00022         /**
00023          * Random Interval based sleeping
00024          *
00025          * This function ''sleeps'' for a maximum of ``max_usecs_total``
00026          * in intervals of ``max_usecs_interval`` at the time.
00027          *
00028          * @param start the start time
00029          * @param current the current time
00030          * @param max_usecs_interval maximum sleep per interval
00031          * @param max_usecs_total maximum total sleep
00032          *
00033          * @return 0 SUCCESS
00034          * @return 1 End of Period
00035          *
00036          */
00037         int random_sleep_period(struct timeval *start, struct timeval *current, int max_usecs_interval, int max_usecs_total);
